fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Once played, Mariah Carey freezes 3 cards on the next player's hand but adds a ( <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:lime:1108048230542999633> ) color to 2 random cards in their hand.

fields.name: - Flipped ( ❄️ + ❄️ + <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:lime:1108048230542999633> + ❄️ + ❄️ ):
fields.value:
Once played, Mariah Carey freezes 4 cards on a player's hand of your choosing but adds a ( <:red:1106234051129507932> ) color to 1 random card in their hand.
- merry crisis
